title: Tseitin axioms
content: A collection of Tseitin axioms used to convert a wff to Conjunctive Normal Form.

blocks.name: fald
blocks.content: Refutation of falsity, in deduction form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 24-Mar-2018.)
